text: Lucía Figar (2011) Lucía Figar de Lacalle (born Madrid, 4 February 1975) is a Spanish politician in the People's Party. She was the Minister of Education, Youth and Sports in the Government of the Community of Madrid during the period of 2012 to 2015, when she resigned after being charged in Operación Púnica."Dos consejeros de Ignacio González dimiten para facilitar un pacto entre el PP y Ciudadanos en Madrid". El Diario, 4 June 2015. (in Spanish) She serves as secretary of Communication in the People's Party of the Madrid Community.Organigrama del Partido Popular de Madrid (in Spanish) == References == Category:Politicians from Madrid Category:People's Party (Spain) politicians Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Women government ministers of Spain Category:Government ministers of the Community of Madrid Category:Members of the 8th Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 9th Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the People's Parliamentary Group (Assembly of Madrid)
title: Lucía Figar
